entry.title: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT, Renfrew
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:06 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Garrison Petawawa 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 48 %
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: NNW 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero with patchy frost. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low zero with patchy frost. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016
